INTO MSSAPP.MC_AC_STK_TXN_DTL_STAT (AC_STK_TXN_DTL_STK_STAT_ID, AC_STK_TXN_DTL_ID, STK_STAT_CDE, STK_QTY, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES ( #{item.acStkTxnDtlStkStatId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.acStkTxnDtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.stkStatCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stkQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
